name: zacks-stock-ranking
title: Zacks Stock Ranking
description: Zacks.com is the website for Zacks Investment Research, an independent investment research firm known for its proprietary Zacks Rank, a stock rating system (1=Strong Buy to 5=Strong Sell) based on earnings estimate revisions.
author: joshmillgate

commands.name: zacks-search
commands.title: Zacks Search
commands.subtitle: Search for any stock ticker
commands.description: Search for a stock and view Zacks Rank and detailed financial data

commands.name: zacks-recents
commands.title: Zacks Recents
commands.subtitle: View recently searched stocks
commands.description: Quick access to your recently searched stock tickers

commands.name: zacks-quick
commands.title: Zacks
commands.subtitle: Enter ticker directly
commands.description: Quickly look up a stock by entering the ticker symbol directly

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
